price: 42. Nabii Huud mari finqiteek lakat aka horaari ginne.
arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma anshanā min baʿdihim qurūnan ākharīna
